Title: Relates to establishing a gender affirming care fund
Summary: Establishes a gender affirming care fund and program to provide support and increase access to gender affirming care including medical and surgical care and therapies, equipment and supplies and mental health treatment.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 2-F ยง244-a, Pub Health L; add ยง95-l, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the state finance law, in relation to the gender affirming care program
